"Jackie Brown" - Quentin Tarantino finally makes another big one, perhaps better than "Pulp Fiction" because the Elmore Leonard story lets him relax into the L.A.-low ambience and scrounging characters, wonderfully acted by Robert Forster, Pam Grier, Samuel L. Jackson, Michael Keaton and Bridget Fonda, plus (almost undercover) Robert De Niro.
